page.title: 03BADBURY RINGS
page.content: This is a site of {ROMAN}buildings. {(VIEWPOINT) { There is a {Veiw point}around{327 feet above sea level.There are five views from the centre of the rings.1)To the Isle of Wight.2)To Ballard Down.3)Spetisbury Rings.4)Hod Hill.5)Knowlton Church. Most people come to {BADBURY RINGS} just for the view.Some people also come for {games and picnics }and a lot more reasons.There are also sheep (if you like animals).Lots of bar-be-ques are also lit,again for pleasure.The reason for {BADBURY RINGS }is mainly for enjoyment and for the historical surroundings.
